post.body: Bummer, our snow, is now rain... Had my MRI of the C-spine last night; go to the Dr for results the first wk of Jan. Yah,for the weekend
Just got back from the gym w/ dd and out to shop in the 6 inches of snow then turn to ice kind of Christmas weather....
Baby, it's cold outside...with the wind chill it has to be like 20 or so below....brrrrr
Watching on TLC Holiday lights show...pretty kewl and outrageous... LOL
Bringing in all the herbs that I can today; thyme, oregano, rosemary, basil and will dry sage in the oven to use over the winter.
Rainy weekend here in Michigan; going off to church and hopefully a nap later..LOL
Scrapbooking, Cooking, Foodies, Gardens, Prayer, Family, Photography, Michigan,
